mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT left(code,2) sido_code, city sido_name FROM baseaddress ORDER BY sido_code
SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(code,3,3) gugun_code, gugun gugun_name FROM baseaddress WHERE LEFT(code,2) = #{sido} ORDER BY gugun_code
SELECT DISTINCT RIGHT(code,5) code, dong FROM baseaddress WHERE siguguncode = #{sigugun} ORDER BY dong
SELECT code,dong,AptName,jibun, lat,lng FROM houseinfo WHERE dong LIKE (SELECT dong FROM baseaddress WHERE code = #{totalcode}) ORDER BY AptName
SELECT dong, AptName, buildYear, jibun, dealAmount, dealYear FROM housedeal WHERE AptName like concat('%', #{searchName}, '%') ORDER BY AptName
